ã¨ã®ã“ã¨ã§ï¼Œãã‚Œã¯ãã‚Œã§å¦¥å½“ãªé¸æŠã ã¨æ€ã†ã€‚

ãŸã ï¼Œç§ã¯ GNU æ‹¡å¼µã‚·ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ã«å¯¾å¿œã—ãŸ spf13/pflag ãŒä½¿ã„ãŸã‹ã£ãŸã®ã‚ˆã€‚

ã¨ã„ã†ã‚ã‘ã§ï¼Œã‚ªãƒªã‚¸ãƒŠãƒ«ã® hymkor/struct2flag ã‹ã‚‰ fork ã—ã¦ spf13/pflag ã‚’ä½¿ã†ã‚ˆã†æ”¹é€ ã—ãŸ goark/struct2pflag ã‚’ãƒªãƒªãƒ¼ã‚¹ã—ãŸ1ã€‚ ä½¿ã„æ–¹ã¯ hymkor/struct2flag ã¨ã»ã¼åŒã˜ã€‚ ä»¥å‰æ›¸ã„ãŸã€Œstruct2flag ã§ã‚³ãƒãƒ³ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ³è§£æã€ã®ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’ goark/struct2pflag ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦æ›¸ãæ›ãˆã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã€‚

package main

import (
	"fmt"
	"strings"

	"github.com/goark/struct2pflag"
	"github.com/spf13/pflag"
)

type Flags struct {
	N    bool   `pflag:"no-newline,n,omit trailing newline"`
	Sep  string `pflag:"sep,s,separator"`
	Strs []string
}

func NewFlags() *Flags {
	return &Flags{N: false, Sep: " ", Strs: []string{}}
}

func Echo(f *Flags) {
	fmt.Print(strings.Join(f.Strs, f.Sep))
	if !f.N {
		fmt.Println()
	}
}

func main() {
	f := NewFlags()
	struct2pflag.BindDefault(f)
	pflag.Parse()
	f.Strs = pflag.Args()

	Echo(f)
}

Go 1.22 ã§ math/rand/v2 ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒç™»å ´ã—ãŸãŸã‚ï¼Œ Mersenne Twister ç–‘ä¼¼ä¹±æ•°ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ã‚’å®Ÿè£…ã—ãŸæ‹™ä½œã® github.com/goark/mt ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚‚ math/rand/v2 ã«å¯¾å¿œã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã«ã—ãŸã€‚

ã¾ãšã¯ãƒãƒ¼ã‚¸ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’ v2 ã«ä¸Šã’ã¦ï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ»ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã«å¤‰æ›´ã—ãŸã€‚

import "github.com/goark/mt/v2"

ã¾ãŸ go.mod ã‚‚åŒæ§˜ã«

require github.com/goark/mt/v2 v2.0.1

ã¨ã™ã‚‹ã€‚

ä¾‹ã¨ã—ã¦ github.com/goark/mt/v2 ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨ math/rand/v2 ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã¦æ¨™æº–æ­£è¦åˆ†å¸ƒã™ã‚‹å€¤ã‚’1ä¸‡å€‹ç”Ÿæˆã—ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã€‚

package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "math"
    "math/rand/v2"

    "github.com/goark/mt/v2/mt19937"
)

func main() {
    rnd := rand.New(mt19937.New(rand.Int64()))
    points := []float64{}
    max := 0.0
    min := 1.0
    sum := 0.0
    for range 10000 {
        point := rnd.NormFloat64()
        points = append(points, point)
        min = math.Min(min, point)
        max = math.Max(max, point)
        sum += point
    }
    n := float64(len(points))
    ave := sum / n
    d2 := 0.0
    for _, p := range points {
        d2 += (p - ave) * (p - ave)
    }
    fmt.Println("           minimum: ", min)
    fmt.Println("           maximum: ", max)
    fmt.Println("           average: ", ave)
    fmt.Println("standard deviation: ", math.Sqrt(d2/n))
}

           average:  0.010399867661332784

package main

import (
    "fmt"
    "sync"

    "github.com/goark/errs"
)

func generateMultiError() error {
    errlist := &errs.Errors{}
    var wg sync.WaitGroup
    for i := 1; i <= 2; i++ {
        i := i
        wg.Add(1)
        go func() {
            defer wg.Done()
            errlist.Add(fmt.Errorf("error %d", i))
        }()
    }
    wg.Wait()
    return errlist.ErrorOrNil()
}

func main() {
    err := generateMultiError()
    fmt.Printf("%+v\n", err) // {"Type":"*errs.Errors","Errs":[{"Type":"*errors.errorString","Msg":"error 2"},{"Type":"*errors.errorString","Msg":"error 1"}]}
}

func Unwraps(err error) []error {

        if es, ok := err.(interface {

package main

import (
	"flag"
	"fmt"
	"io"
	"os"

	"github.com/goark/go-cvss/v3/metric"
	"github.com/goark/go-cvss/v3/report"
	"golang.org/x/text/language"
)

var template = "- `{{ .Vector }}`" + `
- {{ .SeverityName }}: {{ .SeverityValue }} (Score: {{ .BaseScore }})

| {{ .BaseMetrics }} | {{ .BaseMetricValue }} |
|--------|-------|
| {{ .AVName }} | {{ .AVValue }} |
| {{ .ACName }} | {{ .ACValue }} |
| {{ .PRName }} | {{ .PRValue }} |
| {{ .UIName }} | {{ .UIValue }} |
| {{ .SName }} | {{ .SValue }} |
| {{ .CName }} | {{ .CValue }} |
| {{ .IName }} | {{ .IValue }} |
| {{ .AName }} | {{ .AValue }} |
`

func main() {
	flag.Parse()
	if flag.NArg() < 1 {
		fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, "Set CVSS vector")
		return
	}
	bm, err := metric.NewBase().Decode(flag.Arg(0))
	if err != nil {
		fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, "%+v\n", err)
		return
	}
	r, err := report.NewBase(bm, report.WithOptionsLanguage(language.Japanese)).ExportWithString(template)
	if err != nil {
		fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, "%+v\n", err)
		return
	}
	if _, err := io.Copy(os.Stdout, r); err != nil {
		fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, "%+v\n", err)
	}
}

æ‹™ä½œ github.com/goark/sshql ã¯ SSH çµŒç”±ã§ MySQL ã‚„ PostgreSQL ã¨ã„ã£ãŸ RDBMS ã«æ¥ç¶šã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã® Go ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

// Dialer is authentication provider information.
type Dialer struct {
    Hostname      string `json:"hostname"`
    Port          int    `json:"port"`
    Username      string `json:"username"`
    Password      string `json:"password"`
    PrivateKey    string `json:"privateKey"`
    IgnoreHostKey bool   `json:"IgnoreHostKey"`
    client        *ssh.Client
}

ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ¯ãƒ¼ãƒ‰èªè¨¼ã®å ´åˆã¯ Username ã¨ Password ã«ãã‚Œãã‚Œå€¤ã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã€‚ PrivateKey ã«èªè¨¼ç”¨ã®ç§˜å¯†éµã¸ã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ã‚’æŒ‡å®šã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ Password ã«ç§˜å¯†éµã®ãƒ‘ã‚¹ãƒ•ãƒ¬ãƒ¼ã‚ºã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã€‚ ã¾ãŸ ssh-agent ç­‰ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ $SSH_AUTH_SOCK ã‚½ã‚±ãƒƒãƒˆã‹ã‚‰ç§˜å¯†éµã‚’å–å¾—ã§ãã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ï¼Œã“ã¡ã‚‰ã‚’å„ªå…ˆã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚

IgnoreHostKey ã« true ã‚’ã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã™ã‚‹ã¨ãƒ›ã‚¹ãƒˆèªè¨¼ã‚’ç„¡è¦–ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã«ãªã£ã¦ã„ã‚‹ãŒï¼Œã‚»ã‚­ãƒ¥ãƒªãƒ†ã‚£ä¸ŠãŠå‹§ã‚ã§ããªã„ã®ã§ã”æ³¨æ„ã‚’ã€‚ ãƒ›ã‚¹ãƒˆèªè¨¼ã¯ $HOME/.ssh/known_hosts ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã«ãƒ›ã‚¹ãƒˆéµãŒç™»éŒ²ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒå‰æã§ï¼Œ known_hosts ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ãŒãªã„ï¼Œã¾ãŸã¯ known_hosts ã«ãƒ›ã‚¹ãƒˆéµãŒãªã„å ´åˆã¯

$ go run main.go
ssh: handshake failed: knownhosts: key is unknown

ã¨ã„ã†æ„Ÿã˜ã«ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼ã«ãªã‚‹ã€‚

ã§ã¯ï¼Œã“ã‚Œã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦å®Ÿéš›ã«ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ›¸ã„ã¦ã¿ã‚‹ã€‚

github.com/lib/pq + github.com/goark/sshql

ã¾ãšã¯ PostgreSQL ç”¨ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ github.com/lib/pq ã¨ github.com/goark/sshql ã‚’çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã‚‹ã¨ã“ã‚ã‹ã‚‰ã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«æ›¸ã‘ã‚‹ã€‚

package main

import (
    "database/sql"
    "fmt"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/sshql"
    "github.com/goark/sshql/pgdrv"
)

func main() {
    dialer := &sshql.Dialer{
        Hostname:   "sshserver",
        Port:       22,
        Username:   "remoteuser",
        Password:   "passphraseforauthkey",
        PrivateKey: "/home/username/.ssh/id_eddsa",
    }
    pgdrv.New(dialer).Register("postgres+ssh")

    db, err := sql.Open("postgres+ssh", "postgres://dbuser:dbpassword@localhost:5432/example?sslmode=disable")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer dialer.Close()
    defer db.Close()

    rows, err := db.Query("SELECT id, name FROM example ORDER BY id")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    for rows.Next() {
        var id int64
        var name string
        if err := rows.Scan(&id, &name); err != nil {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
            break
        }
        fmt.Printf("ID: %d  Name: %s\n", id, name)
    }
    rows.Close()
}

"postgres+ssh" ã¨ã—ã¦ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã—ï¼ˆåå‰ã¯ä½•ã§ã‚‚OKï¼‰ï¼Œã“ã®åå‰ã‚’ sql.Open() é–¢æ•°ã§æŒ‡å®šã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã®ãŒãƒã‚¤ãƒ³ãƒˆã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚ ã‚ã¨ã¯ database/sql ã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚’ãã®ã¾ã¾ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã‚‹ã€‚

github.com/jackc/pgx ã¯ github.com/lib/pq ã®å¾Œç¶™ã¨ã‚‚è¨€ãˆã‚‹ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚ æ¨™æº– database/sql ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã¨çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã¦ä½¿ã†ã“ã¨ã‚‚å¯èƒ½ã ãŒï¼Œè‡ªèº«ãŒ database/sql äº’æ›ã®ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ•ã‚§ãƒ¼ã‚¹ã‚’æŒã£ã¦ã„ã¦æ›´ã«ç‹¬è‡ªã®æ©Ÿèƒ½ã‚‚æ­è¼‰ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ã€‚ PostgreSQL ã«ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã™ã‚‹ãªã‚‰ï¼Œå€‹äººçš„ã«ã¯ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã®ã»ã†ãŒãŠå‹§ã‚ã§ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

æ‹™ä½œ github.com/goark/sshql ã¨çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã¦ä½¿ã†ã«ã¯ã¡ã‚‡ã£ã¨å¤‰å‰‡çš„ãªåˆæœŸåŒ–ã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã‚’æ›¸ãã€‚ ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã€‚

package main

import (
    "context"
    "fmt"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/sshql"
    "github.com/jackc/pgx/v4/pgxpool"
)

func main() {
    dialer := &sshql.Dialer{
        Hostname:   "sshserver",
        Port:       22,
        Username:   "remoteuser",
        Password:   "passphraseforauthkey",
        PrivateKey: "/home/username/.ssh/id_eddsa",
    }

    cfg, err := pgxpool.ParseConfig("postgres://dbuser:dbpassword@localhost:5432/example?sslmode=disable")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    cfg.ConnConfig.DialFunc = dialer.DialContext

    if err := dialer.Connect(); err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer dialer.Close()

    pool, err := pgxpool.ConnectConfig(context.TODO(), cfg)
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer pool.Close()

    rows, err := pool.Query(context.TODO(), "SELECT id, name FROM example ORDER BY id")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    rows.Close()

    for rows.Next() {
        var id int64
        var name string
        if err := rows.Scan(&id, &name); err != nil {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
            break
        }
        fmt.Printf("ID: %d  Name: %s\n", id, name)
    }
}

ã¾ãš pgx.ConnConfig ã‚’å«ã‚€ pgx/pgxpool.Config æ§‹é€ ä½“ã‚’ä½œã£ã¦ï¼Œãã“ã« dialer.DialContext() ãƒ¡ã‚½ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã™ã‚‹ã‚¤ãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã€‚ pgx ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒ—ãƒ³ã™ã‚‹å‰ã« dialer.Connect() ã¤ã¾ã‚Š SSH æ¥ç¶šã‚’æ˜ç¤ºçš„ã«è¨˜è¿°ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

ä¸€è¦‹ã¾ã©ã‚ã“ã—ãè¦‹ãˆã‚‹ãŒï¼Œ pgx/pgxpool.Config æ§‹é€ ä½“ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ logger ç™»éŒ²ã‚’å«ã‚€ã‚«ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒã‚¤ã‚ºãŒã§ãã‚‹ã®ã§ï¼Œå®Ÿç”¨ä¸Šã¯ãã‚Œã»ã©è¿‚é ãªã‚³ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã§ã¯ãªã‹ã£ãŸã‚Šã™ã‚‹ã€‚ æ¥ç¶šã”ã¨ã«ã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¹ã‚’ä½œã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§ï¼Œã‚°ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒãƒ«ã«åå‰ã‚’ã¤ã‘ã¦ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒãƒ¼ã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã‚Šåˆç†çš„ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œãªã„ã€‚

MySQL ç”¨ãƒ‰ãƒ©ã‚¤ãƒ github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql ã¨ github.com/goark/sshql ã¨ã®çµ„ã¿åˆã‚ã›ã¯ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã€‚

        Hostname:   "sshserver",
        Port:       22,
        Username:   "remoteuser",
        Password:   "passphraseforauthkey",
        PrivateKey: "/home/username/.ssh/id_eddsa",
    }
    mysqldrv.New(dialer).RegisterDial("ssh+tcp")

    db, err := sql.Open("mysql", "dbuser:dbpassword@ssh+tcp(localhost:3306)/dbname")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer dialer.Close()
    defer db.Close()

    rows, err := db.Query("SELECT id, name FROM example ORDER BY id")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    for rows.Next() {
        var id int64
        var name string
        if err := rows.Scan(&id, &name); err != nil {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
            break
        }
        fmt.Printf("ID: %d  Name: %s\n", id, name)
    }
    rows.Close()
}

MySQL ã®å ´åˆ SSH ã§ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã™ã‚‹ãŸã‚ã® Dialer ã‚’ç™»éŒ²ã—ã¦ï¼Œç™»éŒ²æ–‡å­—åˆ—ã‚’ DSN ã«å«ã‚ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

ã•ã‚‰ã«ï¼Œã“ã®ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä½¿ã£ãŸ PostgreSQL ã¸ã® SSH è¶Šã—ã®ã‚¢ã‚¯ã‚»ã‚¹ã¯ã“ã‚“ãªæ„Ÿã˜ã«æ›¸ã‘ã‚‹ã€‚

package main

import (
    "database/sql"
    "fmt"
    "os"

    "github.com/goark/sshql"
    "github.com/goark/sshql/pgdrv"
)

func main() {
    dialer := &sshql.Dialer{
        Hostname:   "sshserver",
        Port:       22,
        Username:   "remoteuser",
        Password:   "passphraseforauthkey",
        PrivateKey: "/home/username/.ssh/id_eddsa",
    }
    pgdrv.New(dialer).Register("postgres+ssh")

    db, err := sql.Open("postgres+ssh", "postgres://dbuser:dbpassword@localhost:5432/example?sslmode=disable")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    defer dialer.Close()
    defer db.Close()

    rows, err := db.Query("SELECT id, name FROM example ORDER BY id")
    if err != nil {
        fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
        return
    }
    for rows.Next() {
        var id int64
        var name string
        if err := rows.Scan(&id, &name); err != nil {
            fmt.Fprintln(os.Stderr, err)
            break
        }
        fmt.Printf("ID: %d  Name: %s\n", id, name)
    }
    rows.Close()
}

// InsecureIgnoreHostKey returns a function that can be used for
// ClientConfig.HostKeyCallback to accept any host key. It should
// not be used for production code.
func InsecureIgnoreHostKey() HostKeyCallback {
    return func(hostname string, remote net.Addr, key PublicKey) error {
        return nil
    }
}
